example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يبدو) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_PROP عيد)) (S (CONJ و) (VP (CV+CVSUFF_SUBJ:2MS كأنه) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_NOM متأكد) (PP (PREP من) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (PRON_1S ني)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:1S تسرعت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تأويل) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN العبارة))

arg.g: that I have rushed to interpret the expression

example.arg: من انني تسرعت في تأويل العبارة
